Yuma.KLJZ: KLJZ (93.1 FM, "Z93") is a commercial radio station in Yuma, Arizona, United States. KLJZ airs a Hot AC format featuring the top artists of today. Listeners get to wake up to Kidd Kraddick in the Morning weekdays from 5-10am, then The Hollywood 5 with Kidd Kraddick on Saturdays from 8-10am.
